inclusion.criterion: At least one other TB clinical symptom
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Suggestive TB on chest x-ray based on pulmonologist or internist consultant of pulmonology opinion
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or any serious condition includes, but not limited to, liver disease, chronic kidney disease, and psychiatric illness that might interfere with study compliance (based on the clinician judgment).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He is a previously healthy man, working as an engineer in a high tech company.
